title: BATS!
description: A swarm of bats has infested part of the settlement, nesting in the rafters and contaminating food stores. They’re a nuisance, possibly dangerous. How do we deal with them?

options.text: Beck - They’re just trying to survive, like us. Set up some barriers and let’s learn to live with them.
options.outcome: The bats remain. One man dies of disease. Otherwise the containment is successful with minor losses.

options.text: Old-Timer - Bats are a delicacy in some parts of the world. Meat is meat. This is a blessing in disguise!
options.outcome: The bats are hunted and consumed. Sever men die of infectious disease, but our freezers are stocked.

options.text: Shady - We don’t have time for this. Smoke them out, destroy their nests, and keep our supplies safe.
options.outcome: It took forever, but the bats are wiped out completely. The camp cheers to be rid of the pests.
